content: CFS-SL GA Extended Speed Sleeve Pathway device for high-traffic cabling with optimal airflow control ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Firestop devices and sleeves- - - ### FEATURES:Features Functional and compliant when properly installed Twist-to-close mechanism – for easier and remote re-penetration while protecting cables Straightforward inspection – you can see if the sleeve is closed without having to check behind a covering fringe above the ceiling Superior smoke tightness and airflow control thanks to its twisting mechanism Smoke gaskets eliminate need for sealant or putty Applications Sealing penetrations for single cables and cable bundles Suitable for small to medium-sized circular openings in walls and ceilings For use on drywall, concrete, masonry and sandwich panel The ideal solution when cable configurations are regularly changed, such as in data centers, server rooms, hospitals, event halls or production plants For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Maximum wall thickness: 11-13/16 in Product Class: Ultimate Outside diameter (flange): 6.7 in Technical Data | Product Class | Ultimate | Application temperature range | 23 - 122 °F | Storage and transportation temperature range | 23 - 122 °F | Temperature resistance range | -22 - 167 °F ### ITEMS- 2178494 - Firestop sleeve CFS-SL GA L - Package Size 1 pc
